Articles.Content:
Hello players !

I was looking at the saves files and it seems AsteroÃƒÂ¯ds are generated by a seed : share your peculiar seeds which give strange, biggest or smallest asteroÃƒÂ¯d

It looks this way in the save : 

PART
            {
                name = PotatoRoid
[...]
            MODULE
                           {
                                  name = ModuleAsteroid
                                  isEnabled = True
                                  seed = xxxxxxxx

With some chance it's not a hash-type function and we could find a logic in it (even if it seems to be)
